text:
Are these custom tasks or a core ones that you're having trouble with?

I've been fighting with a, possibly, related issue: 7926.  I tried switching 
the order during my trials and it did not help the XmlLogger problem - but 
maybe it will help this particular issue?  There are comments that mention that 
this ordering is done this way - so there is likely to be good reason for it to 
stay as-is.
creator: jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com

text:
The reason for this order is that loggers can attribute messages generated
during configuration to the correct tasks (see what XmlLogger will do if it
receives a message event before the taskStarted).
